page.title: 14SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: The area has a number of institutions which provide residential care for the elderly, the young and the handicapped. For the elderly there are several local authority homes and several private institutions set up in the 18th and 19th centuries by charitable bodies. The young are cared for in Medvale House in accordance with the provisions of the Children and Young Persons Act. The Handicapped, in mind and body, are cared for mainly in the community, but in residential accommodation when the family is unable to cope. The following two pages examine aspects of residential care for the elderly in Rochester upon Medway.
